attributes.action: ACT NOW AND SAY NO TO TURKEY JOINING THE EU, AS WE DON’T WANT BRITAIN ISLAMISED.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By letting Turkey (a Muslim country) join, it will be the most dangerous and unsafe move that Britain will have done in its lifetime. We see Muslims now protesting on our streets, holding placards "Support a caliphate", "Death to Infidels", "Behead those who insult Islam". Isn't that enough to justify the reality of what could happen to this country once they arrive here. We urge the PM to think twice about this country joining.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. As explained in our terms and conditions (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms) this can make petitions fall foul of our 'impossible to read' criteria.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
